scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.win:build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
scripts.win:deploy:full: npm run win:build:ui && npm run deploy
